    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Application
    Represents an application submitted by a student for an internship opportunity.
    ApplicationService
    Service class for managing internship applications.
    CareerCenterStaff
    Represents a career center staff member who manages company representatives, internship opportunities, and applications.
    CareerStaffMenuHandler
    Menu handler for career center staff operations.
    CompanyRepMenuHandler
    Menu handler for company representative operations.
    CompanyRepresentative
    Represents a company representative who can create and manage internship opportunities.
    CsvApplicationRepository
    CSV-based repository implementation for managing applications.
    CsvInternshipRepository
    CSV-based repository implementation for managing internship opportunities.
    CsvUserRepository
    CSV-based repository implementation for managing users.
    FilterManager
    Manages filtering and sorting settings for internship listings.
    IApplicationRepository
    Repository interface for managing internship applications.
    IInternshipRepository
    Repository interface for managing internship opportunities.
    IMenuHandler
    Interface for menu handlers that display and manage user menus.
    InternshipOpportunity
    Represents an internship opportunity created by a company representative.
    InternshipPlacementSystem
    Main system class for the internship placement application.
    InternshipService
    Service class for managing internship opportunities.
    IUserRepository
    Repository interface for managing users.
    MajorCatalog
    Shared catalog of supported majors for consistent major lists across the system.
    PasswordUtil
    Utility class for password hashing and verification using SHA-256 with salt.
    Report
    Represents a report of internship opportunities with applied filters.
    ReportManager
    Singleton manager for generating and displaying internship reports.
    Statistics
    Class for calculating and displaying various statistics related to internships and applications.
    Student
    Represents a student user who can apply for internships.
    StudentMenuHandler
    Menu handler for student operations.
    UIHelper
    Utility class for UI-related helper methods.
    User
    Abstract base class for all user types in the system.
    UserService
    Service class for managing user operations like login and registration.
    VerifyPassword
